title: Wanted to Buy T213 series 2 cards
author: tbob

posts.post_title: Wanted to Buy T213 series 2 cards
posts.post_content:
I need the following 1914 T213 Coupon series 2 cards (20 for 5)
Billy Campbell
Frank Chance New York both Portrait and Batting
Billy Chapelle Brooklyn
Larry Chappelle Cleveland
Harry Davis Phil. Amer.
Ray Demmitt New York AL
Mickey Doolin Chicago Batting and Fielding
Dick Hoblitzell Boston Nat. and Boston Amer.
Walter Johnson
Joe Kelley Toronto
Ed Konetchy Pittsburgh Nat and Pittsburgh Fed. and Boston
Sherry Magee Boston
Rube Marquard Pitching Brooklyn
George McQuillan Phila. Nat.
Mike Mowrey Brooklyn
Red Murray Chicago and Kansas City
Jack Quinn Vernon
Ed Reulbach Pittsburgh Brooklyn Nat. and Brooklyn Fed.
Admiral Schlei Portrait
Gabby Street Catching and Portrait
Jeff Sweeney Richmond
Joe Tinker Bat on Shoulder Chicago Nat 
Jack Warhop St. Louis
Ed Willett Memphis 
Hooks Wiltse Brooklyn Pitching and Portrait

Thanks just send me a PM or email and let me know what you have, whether it's one card or many. I have been here since the beginning and have an eBay transaction number over 10,000 with 100%.
TBob.

Bump.
Graded or ungraded is fine.
